subject: Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Barbaro's home now, and for months to come, is a 12-foot-by-12-foot stall in the climate-controlled intensive-care unit of the University of Pennsylvania's George D. Widener Hospital for Large Animals.
